ItemDescription.SourceString: Hitting an enemy empowers Storm Wave to shoot a piercing wave of energy, dealing 245% of weapon damage. Stacks up to 7 times, increasing the width of the wave with each stack. All stacks are removed on using Storm Wave or switching weapons.
ItemDescription.LocalizedString: Hitting an enemy empowers Storm Wave to shoot a piercing wave of energy, dealing 245% of weapon damage. Stacks up to 7 times, increasing the width of the wave with each stack. All stacks are removed on using Storm Wave or switching weapons.
